law.catch_line: Appointment of Secretary of State as attorney to receive legal process.
law.text: A workersâ€™ compensation self-insured group issued a certificate of filing under this subtitle is deemed to have appointed the Secretary of State as its attorney to receive service of legal process issued against it in Kentucky. This appointment shall be irrevocable, shall bind any successor in interest, and shall remain in effect as long as the self-insured group has workersâ€™ compensation exposures in this Commonwealth.
law.history: Created 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 7, sec. 16, effective March 1, 2005.
